description: TATTON â€“ a boutique collection of family friendly townhomes surrounded by nature in beautiful Burke Mountain. This 3 storey home offers a bright open layout with 9' ceilings. Gourmet kitchen with island, quartz counters and stainless steel appliances. Spacious dining and living areas with abundant natural light. Generous primary bedroom with large 4 piece ensuite. Lower level room can be a 3rd bedroom (no closet) or home office/flex space. Home features insuite laundry, private balcony/sundeck, gated front yard, oversized garage with storage, and large parking pad. Across from Victoria Park and 1 block to Leigh Elementary. Pet friendly, steps to transit, 15 minutes to Coquitlam Centre and SkyTrain.
